Description: Green glazed composition shabti of ʿnḫ-Ḥr..., Priest of Amun with a black lappet-wig, a summarily modelled face with traced eyes and crossed arms in relief holding two black hoes; the front of the leg section is inscribed with a column of black painted Hieroglyphs; the back is decorated with a representation of a black seed-basket.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Mrs Ethel M Scott
